Sentencas: One of the promising electrolyte materials for solid oxide fuel cells application, Sr- and Mg-doped lanthanum gallate La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-delta (LSGM), is synthesized by conventional solid state ceramic route.
Titulo: Influence of small DC bias field on the electrical behaviour of Sr- and Mg-doped lanthanum gallate

Sentencas: X-ray Rietveld analysis confirms the formation of main orthorhombic phase at room temperature along with a few minor secondary phases.
Titulo: Influence of small DC bias field on the electrical behaviour of Sr- and Mg-doped lanthanum gallate

Sentencas: SEM micrograph reveals the grain and grainboundary morphology of the system.
Titulo: Influence of small DC bias field on the electrical behaviour of Sr- and Mg-doped lanthanum gallate

Sentencas: Electrical conductivity of the LSGM sample is measured in the temperature range 573-873 K and in the frequency range 20 Hz-1 MHz at a few small DC bias fields (at 0.0, 0.5, 1.0, 1.5 and 2.0 V).
Titulo: Influence of small DC bias field on the electrical behaviour of Sr- and Mg-doped lanthanum gallate

Sentencas: The conductivity spectra show power-law behaviour.
Titulo: Influence of small DC bias field on the electrical behaviour of Sr- and Mg-doped lanthanum gallate

Sentencas: Electrical conductivity of the sample is found to be weakly dependent on DC bias field.
Titulo: Influence of small DC bias field on the electrical behaviour of Sr- and Mg-doped lanthanum gallate

Sentencas: This is attributed to field-dependent bulk and grainboundary conduction processes.
Titulo: Influence of small DC bias field on the electrical behaviour of Sr- and Mg-doped lanthanum gallate

Sentencas: In the present system, under investigated bias field range, the possibility of formation of Schottky barrier is ruled out.
Titulo: Influence of small DC bias field on the electrical behaviour of Sr- and Mg-doped lanthanum gallate

Sentencas: The concept of grainboundary channel (pathway) modulation on the application of bias field is proposed.
Titulo: Influence of small DC bias field on the electrical behaviour of Sr- and Mg-doped lanthanum gallate
